DOC.brief_title: High Dose Atorvastatin Preventing Periprocedural Ischemic Brain Damage During Carotid Artery Stenting
DOC.detailed_description: Chinese patient carotid stenosis schedule selective CAS randomize two group . The High-dose Atorvastatin group receive Atorvastatin 80 mg QD 3 day 3 day CAS , 20 mg QD 30 day CAS , Conventional-dose Atorvastatin group receive Atorvastatin 20 mg QD 3 day 30 day CAS . All patient receive cerebral diffusion-weighted ( DW ) -MRI within 24-72 hr CAS . Then , also receive repeat DW-MRI within 24-72 hr CAS . Efficacy prevention periprocedural ischemic brain damage two different Atorvastatin treatment compare , term periprocedural incidence transient ischemic attack ( TIA ) / ischaemic stroke new ischemic lesion cerebral DW-MRI .
